title: Medtronic’s Diabetes Management Business MiniMed Files for IPO
description: MiniMed Group Inc., a diabetes management firm that will be separated from health care giant Medtronic Plc, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing growing revenue and a shrinking net loss.
content: MiniMed Group Inc., a diabetes management firm that will be separated from health care giant Medtronic Plc, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing growing revenue and a shrinking net loss.
